name: Minute Heist
description:
Alone on a windy night with nothing but a plan and a cardboard box, you've got 1 minute to evade the rentacops and make your way down to the bank vault, with one bonus minute to be found somewhere in the bank... Get to the vault, collect as much gold as you think you need, drop it at the drop point and escape! But know that greed has heavy consequences...

CONTROLS:

Movement: Left/Right arrow keys or A/D

Hold left shift to move faster

Hide in your box: Down arrow or S

Interact: Click mouse on buttons/number pad and follow the on screen prompts for the others 

Use elevator: E

Escape: R
